alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 5:38PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, northeastern Leon, southeastern Grady and southern Thomas Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 538 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southwest of Thomasville, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Tallahassee, Alma, Fincher, Dills, Moncrief, Festus, Lake Iamonia, Lois, Nash, Rocky Hill, Miccosukee, Iamonia, Drifton, Moccasin Gap, Casa Blanco, Jarrott, Montivilla, Beachton and Metcalf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
